price: 21. Bolanda baye bakotuna bino lifuta ata moko te, mpe bazali na liloba lia bokambami.
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
